Row.Text: I...I'm sorry, everyone. I guess I just wasn't strong enough to keep the people of Planeptune...no, not just Planeptune, but all of Gamindustri, safe. I knew I wouldn't be able to walk in my sister's shoes after all. Please forgive me, everyone...!

Ah, hello! Welcome to Planeptune, I hope you're liking it so far! My name is Nepgear, and I'm the CPU Candidate here! Oh, uh, I mean, I'm THE CPU here now...sorry, just too used to introducing myself as a Candidate. Anyway, pleased to meet you!
Ahh, seeing you again makes me so happy! You wanna take a little break from our leadership duties and play some games with me?[NEWLINE]Oh goodness, I'm starting to sound like Neptune, huh? Ahahaha...
Ohh, it's so good to see a friendly face like yours again! This CPU job is so stressful...but I'm going to keep doing my best!
Good day! Welcome back to Planeptune.
Hello again!
[COLOR:127:127:127:255](She seems to have not noticed your presence. She seems to be doing some sort of technical maintenance on something. Some sort of electronic device?)[ENDCOLOR]
Umm...I'm really not sure what you're doing here, but it might be best if you just go.
Histoire said that speaking to you should only be done when absolutely necessary. I feel like that's good advice.
Something told me you were a bad person. Very well! I'll protect Planeptune no matter what!
These aren't very good odds, but my people have put their faith in me as a CPU! I can't let them down!
I think Underling would be a bigger challenge than you. But if you insist, I suppose I have no choice but to beat you!
Something told me you were a bad person. Very well! I'll protect Planeptune no matter what!
These aren't very good odds, but my people have put their faith in me as a CPU! I can't let them down!
I think Underling would be a bigger challenge than you. But if you insist, I suppose I have no choice but to beat you!

I didn't want to do this, but you haven't given me much of a choice. I'm going to have to go public with my distrust for you![NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])
Eh? But...but why? Was it something I said? Is this my fault?
You can say what you want about me. I know that everything I'm doing is right for Planeptune and Gamindustri. As long as they are okay with me, I don't need your approval!

Our people are now buying your blue jeans and listening to your pop music.[NEWLINE]I'm okay with that, though! Your music is really catchy and helps me relax when doing my work! As long as my people are happy, there's no problem. Right...?
I'm sorry to have to do this, but my citizens have demanded more space for them to live. Please stand down so the loss of life is minimized!
You're one of the bad guys, and while I don't like the idea...I'm gonna have to take you down!

This sword...it's only going to gain the power to save the world through the blood of CPUs and other leaders. I'm sorry, and it hurts me to do this, but...I'm going to have to ask you to give me your life!

I really can't do this anymore. IF kept saying I should keep up the facade until the moment was best to strike, but I can't keep lying to you! The truth is, Planeptune has been intending on attacking you from the beginning. I feel horrible for this, and hope you can forgive me for it...
This was a swell deal! Can we renew it, please?
Great!
Yay!
That's a really great deal for us...are you sure about this? I don't want you bankrupting your own country just for Planeptune's sake!
Goodness, what a bargain! Histy and IF will let me have it if I don't take that, so done!
Thank you, thank you, thank you!
I'm so glad to hear that!
That makes me sooo happy! You're great!
Umm, I think I already said we couldn't do a deal like that, right?
I said no, for goodness' sake!

As a friend, I was hoping I could ask you this...um, Planeptune is in a bit of a slump right now, and we could use some assistance in getting back on our feet. Could you please loan this to us? If you could, I would, by golly, be so, so happy and grateful!
It's over, I've won. Please surrender so we don't have to shed any more blood!
I...guess that our forces are losing, huh? How awful...okay, then. I'm willing to give you whatever you want if you'll agree to stop the fighting.
Looks like my Protagonist Powers weren't as strong as those of my sister...
Could we please agree to stop the fighting?
I'm not going to lose to you, so get ready!
I don't want to keep fighting you, but I don't have much of a choice!
Could we please agree to this as a sign of peace? I don't want to be known for keeping a war going for years on end...
IF says we can get more out of this deal than we've been getting. I don't like extorting people, but I also don't like being taken advantage of.
Goodness gracious, that's more than I can afford! Histoire would get pretty mad if I gave away all our treasury like that.
That's pricier than that swimsuit I bought the other day...I'm sorry, but I can't afford to trade you for that.
Will this work for you? If not, we can keep talking!
And I'll even throw in an N-Gear XL at no additional charge!
It doesn't look like we'll be able to trade that. I'm sorry!
With you and me working together, {1_ThirdPlayerName:textkey} should surrender quite soon! Let's hope they do so we can return to peace.

Wow, your military hardware is so impressive...those weapons and vehicles are so pretty! Um, if you have any that are damaged or anything like that, could I take it apart? Oh no no, I just wanna do it! I'm not going to steal your schematics! I'll do it under your supervision if it puts you at ease!
Based on the martial power of your nation, you must be the main character of this story, not me. I guess I really am poor protagonist material, huh? Ehehe...

How many transistors, resistors, capacitors, and switches do you think you could buy with all that money? Huh? You have no idea? C'mon, just guess. Wait, what do you mean you don't even know how much that stuff costs? Well, I've got the market prices of each brand memorized, so here...
You must have crafted the Credits Up plan, based on how much you've got in the bank! Tell me, where'd you find it? Was it a hidden treasure in some dungeon?
It's no surprise that someone like you is off fighting a war somewhere.
Good luck with that battle you're in! Hopefully it doesn't last much longer; even if Planeptune is safe, I don't like seeing other nations destroy each other either.
Comparing the size of our armies, I'm basically at a New Game+ level. So, for your sake, don't get any bad ideas.
I may not be the most confident person in the world, but I can safely say that nothing you could say or do would scare me. I think I could beat you easily at this point.
With all the destruction you've caused, I'm willing to look at you the same was as I do the Deity of Sin: an enemy which has to be destroyed.
How do you sleep at night, knowing how much suffering and anguish you've caused? Or does it actually make you happy? I just don't understand terrible people like you!
I'm so glad to hear you've become friends with {1_CivName}! It's great to know that we've got so many nations cooperating!

You, me, and {1_CivName} will make such a good team! We should get together and do something like, umm...well, I don't think you two will find it very fun to test circuit boards, so maybe we can just play video games!
I know you're friends with {1_CivName} now, but I don't feel they're very trustworthy. You should be on your guard around them.
Umm, would you like to be my friend and cooperate with me? It'll be good for both of our nations, I'm sure! Everything will be better if we work together for the sake of both of our countries!

I'm glad I met a nation as peaceful and noble as yours! And I'd say it's thanks to your leadership. If you'd like, will you announce to the world that we are on friendly terms with each other? I'd really, really be happy if you did!

It's not something I want to do, but I have to. {1_ThirdPlayerName:textkey} is quickly becoming a threat to Planeptune and the rest of Gamindustri, and I know I probably won't be able to win alone. Could you please help us?
I...I'm just gonna go lock myself in my room and build mini-mechas for a while until you decide to dismantle those nukes of your own accord...
Okay! Let me check with Histoire to see what we can offer.
Mmm, now would be a good time for Miss Kei to be part of my cabinet, huh...
I think you'll like trading with us! We do what other nations don't!
It looks like your spy was caught trying to distribute Arfoire chips. I'd say that makes you a supporter of ASIC. And if that's the case, you...really might want to choose your words carefully.
What the goodness?! IF told me that she found a spy belonging to your nation! Why would you do something as low as try to steal from us? I thought you were better than that...
Would you like to sign a Research Agreement? With our aggressive marketing campaigns, I'm sure we can get more great researchers more quickly than other nations!
Would you like to exchange embassies? I'm sure it'll help bring Planeptune and your great nation closer together!
Would you like to exchange embassies? I'm sure it'll help bring Planeptune and your great nation closer together!
Would you like to sign an Open Borders agreement? I'm sure it'll help bring Planeptune and your great nation even closer together than the embassy did!
Would you like to sign an Open Borders agreement? I'm sure it'll help bring Planeptune and your great nation even closer together than the embassy did!
If you don't stop encroaching on Planeptunian territory with your settlements...then I may have no choice but to retaliate!
Um, could you please stop settling new territory so close to Planeptune? I'd appreciate it...
Umm...ehehe, you must really like seeing me!
I've got work to do! Quit trying to interrupt me, please!
If only I felt like I could trust you, but considering what you've done in the past, that might be tough...

Oh, hey there! I've made a pretty cool breakthrough with our Research Agreement! See, once I took this machine apart and started looking at it, I realized that its internal mechanisms, while not as suited for its intended purpose as it could be, could be repur--[NEWLINE]Eh? "Tell it to the scientists?" You mean that doesn't interest you? I just don't get it!
Ah, hey! It's so nice to have friends over to help take off the stress of running a country!
I hate gossiping about people behind their backs, but...should we perhaps do something about {1_ThirdPlayerName:textkey}? They kind of scare me...
I really hope you're just guarding your borders with those troops, but if not, then I have no intention of backing down!
Wow, that's a lot of troops you have stationed on the borders of our countries. Um...I don't have reason to be worried, right? Ehehe...
You aren't the only nation on this planet, you know! You keep settling and conquering new territories and there's bound to be pushback!
Good to see you again! I just hope that the fact our borders are starting to get a little close isn't going to be an issue going forward.
Do you really think all that land you've bought will make your people happier? I bet the natives that you ripped off to get it are pretty mad at you, as they should be!
I've noticed you bought some new territory near us, and now our borders are much closer. That's not...a sign of hostility, is it? I really hope not!

If it were up to me, I'd say yes in a heartbeat! But, well, my advisors have all really pushed me to be cautious and wait until our relations have been solidified over a longer period of time first. Sorry!

This is going to sound really weird coming from me, but...I need for you to denounce {1_CivName} on my behalf. I really want to avoid going to war with them if possible, so maybe if we both call them out on their behavior, they'll listen?

I just knew that {1_CivName} couldn't be a bad person if you were friends with them, so the two of us have also signed a friendship treaty! Now, if we could only get the rest of the world to follow suit...
I have to agree with you -- {1_CivName} causes nothing but problems for Gamindustri. If we have to gang up on them like this to make them see the error of their ways, then so be it.
I guess even the villains have friends. Looks like that since {1_CivName} is on your side, I can't trust them either.
If {1_CivName} is against you, then I have a feeling they'll make a great ally. I'll get as many friends as I need to protect Planeptune from you!
What are you trying to do, your own Conquest Ending?! Trust me, you don't want to do that - it's terrible for your spirit.

I'm glad you're trying to help {1_MinorCivName:textkey}, but, well...my advisors say that it's politically dangerous for us to appear to compete over their alliance, so I'd appreciate if you could just help them out from a distance.
I'm ready to fight {1_PlayerName:textkey}. You are too, right?
Again, I have to refuse.
If it means avoiding a conflict, then fine. We'll just have to engineer taller buildings to accomodate our growing population, I guess...
You may be mistaking my kindness for a weakness. I'm not going to abide by some arrogant request like that!
Goodness, sure! I'd never turn down the chance to be friends with someone like you!
Sorry...but I refuse.
Mmh, maybe later? I dunno...
I usually do prefer diplomacy, but I do see how much of a threat they are. Alright then, we'll fight them!
Mmh, do you think I could have a little time to gather Shares and train my soldiers first? How does...um, 10 turns, sound? That'll give you time to get ready too!
I was curious if you would accept a trade for that stuff? My people have kinda been going crazy asking for it, and, well, I want to keep them happy!
{@1_MinorCivName} is your ally, and that makes them one of your underlings. I'm going to beat them into submission, whether you like it or not!

I, uh...don't know what got into my soldiers when they attacked {@1_MinorCivName}, but I'm going to try my best to stop them! I hope you aren't upset over this, even though you'd have a right to be...
I just knew someone as great as you would follow the path of Freedom! Let's work together to keep the world out of the clutches of villainous tyrants!

Order really makes sense, doesn't it? Gamindustri has thrived on competition all this time, but now that I've had so much time to think about it, a world in which all citizens hold the rights to all games will eliminate the need for evil groups like ASIC to resort to piracy!

I mean, I don't really like the idea of Autocracy, personally, but...it seems to be more effective for a CPU like to have absolute rule over those who believe in her. If my people are really safer and happier being ruled over like this, then I suppose it's okay. I just hope you're as benevolent of a total ruler as I am!

Wait, what the goodness?! Neptune, where have you been? ...in Planeptune, you said? But this is Planeptune! Hold on, you've been running your own Planeptune too?! What...what is going on in this dimension?[NEWLINE]Well, of course our two Planeptunes will get along great, then! We'll just consider them two halves of a whole nation![NEWLINE]By the way, I'm glad to see you're okay...you had me worried.

Why...why?! Neptune, what is the MATTER with you?! You're already the most popular character, the star of the franchise, and I'm always your...your Luigi! And now you've destroyed my Planeptune, just so you could annex it into your own![NEWLINE]You...you're the most terrible big sister I could have ever had! I wish I was an only CPU!
I really hope I can be as popular and beloved a CPU as you are one day!
Oh, hey, big sis! What can I do for you?
Do you have a spare D-clip or two? I've lost most of mine...
I'm so glad that I've got a reliable and cool big sister like you!
Neptune, I'm not sure why you've been doing what you've been doing, but you need to stop.
What happened to you, Neptune? We used to be on such good terms...
Eh?[NEWLINE]Ehhhhh?! What the goodness?! You're declaring war on my Planeptune?! But why?! We're sisters, and our Planeptunes should be cooperating, not fighting! What's gotten into you...?

Neptune, I'm sorry, but...for the sake of the whole of Planeptune, I plan on unifying both of our sides of the greater nation. By...by force. Forgive me, but it's time for ME to become the protagonist again.
Sure, anything for my big sis! What is it?
What belongs to my half of Planeptune belongs to yours, and vice-versa! Ehehe!

...but why?! Goodness, why would you say that kind of stuff about your own sister? You're...terrible...[NEWLINE][COLOR:127:127:127:255](She slowly breaks down crying. Hope you feel good about bullying your little sister!)[ENDCOLOR]

Neptune, you may be my big sister, and I still love you, but...well, I can't hold it in anymore. What you've been doing lately is unbefitting of the Planeptune legacy...and I'm sorry, but I'm going to have to condemn your Planeptune and assert mine as the true one![NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: When did she grow a spine?[ENDCOLOR])
So, um, it's a little bizarre to have Planeptunian Embassies in Planeptune, but of course we should establish them! I know you'll say yes!
Hey, sis! If we were to open the borders between our Planeptunes, it would be one step closer to uniting them under one banner again! What do you say?

Alright, Neptune, I know we're closer than any other pair of leaders on this planet. We're sisters and we'll always be together! But I think we need to actually put that in writing! I'm sure none of the other nations will want to mess with the might of two Planeptunes and the power of the love between sisters!
Oh, hey! It's Noire! It's good to see you again! I hope Lastation is doing well. How is Uni, by the way? I've really missed her and want to see her again sometime!

Well...Noire, if I were going to be defeated by anyone, I'm glad it was you. I know that you're diligent, reliable, and can use Planeptune's Shares to their fullest effect in Lastation. Please make sure to take good care of my people, okay...?
Eh? You think Uni and I are...ehhhhh?! O-of course not! P-p-please don't say such embarassing stuff, Noire!
Ah, it's Noire! How are things over in Lastation? Good, I hope!
Oh, you brought me some Lastation hardware? Ohh, thank you so much! This just made my week! Steampunk-y stuff makes me soooo excited!
It looks like even Uni and I are on bad terms now. It...really hurts, but so be it. We've already proven that we can't work together anymore...
Noire, it's a shame we're on such bad terms now, but nonetheless, I'll have to ask you to be quick about your business here.
Wait, Noire? What's the meaning of this? A-are you after my Shares? If so...if so, then I won't hold back!

Uni! Oh goodness, it's so good to see you! I hope you're doing well! Knowing you're here makes me a lot happier. This might kinda sound like something my sister would say, but we should really get together and play some games again soon!
Well, it looks like you got your revenge from our duel back in the day. Why did it come to this? I liked you so much and considered you my best friend for so long...*sniff* This is so terrible!
Wow, just seeing your cute pigtails bouncing around when you walk is enough to put a smile on my face.[NEWLINE]...wah, that was embarassing, wasn't it? Ahh, don't call me an idiot! I'm sorry!
I'm so glad to see you again, Uni! What did you wanna talk about?

Wouldn't it be cool if Planeptune made a 100-story-tall mecha and Lastation made all of its armaments? With my tech know-how and your knowledge of guns, it could be the coolest thing ever! It could have rocket launchers, lasers, wrist-mounted chainsaws, drills, Funnels, the Gespenst Kick, and--[NEWLINE]...aww, you're such a buzzkill.
Whenever I think about how our relationship has deteriorated...it just makes me want to cry...

I guess we're back at square one, as nothing but rival leaders competing against each other in the Console War. If that's the case...then so be it. Planeptune's prosperity matters more than our friendship, if I look at it objectively.
Bu-bu-but! But why, Uni?! What did I do wrong?! We're supposed to be best friends! C'mon, don't do this! I don't want to fight you!

Uni, please forgive me, but I have to do this. Lastation has been determined to be a threat to Planeptune's safety, and...well...I have to oblige the concerns of my people and my administration. I'm sorry, Uni-!
You know I'll do whatever I can to help you, Uni! What do you need?
Sure! Maybe we could trade some hardware so that I can finish my latest project and you can finish working on your guns!
Aww, c'mon, there you go with that tsundere act again, Uni. Ehehe...[NEWLINE]Wait. You...you really mean it this time, don't you? That's...horrible...*sniff*

I can't believe it's come to this, but I can't hold it back any longer. Maybe without Noire to lead you, you've lost sight of what's right, or maybe you've just let power get to your head, but you aren't acting like the Uni I know. I'm going to try to get some sense back into you, by letting the world know that what you've been doing is wrong! I hope you can forgive me![NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])
Uni, it seems like we don't have embassies in each others' Basilicoms yet! Kinda embarassing, huh? We should fix that. What do you say?

Hey Uni, what do you say we take our alliances further and open up fully to each other?[NEWLINE]I-I mean, open our nations' borders to each other! Hwaaah, I said something that sounded really weird just then! How embarassing...

Uni, I've got something to tell you. The truth is, I lo--uhh, lo...ok forward to working with you as an allied nation![NEWLINE]Ahahaha...but, um, seriously, it would be amazing if Planeptune and Lastation could set aside all our differences and work together for the common good! So, um...what do you say, Uni? Please?

Vert! Wow, it's been a while since I last saw you...and, um, wow, you're still as...impressive, as ever.[NEWLINE]A hug? Goodness, of course! I-I mean, sure, I wouldn't mind a hug from you again![NEWLINE]Ahhh, so soft...

O...okay. You've won...wait, you're not going to have me killed? What are you going to do with me, then?[NEWLINE]Ehhh?! Make me your little sister and dress me up in lewd cosplay to be posted online?! Waaaahhh! I'd rather just be executed!
Wow, No matter how many times I see it, I'm still impressed by how quickly you're able to 100% all of these new games. Without even any guides...
Ahh, hello again, Vert! How are things?
I know you want a real little sister, but...um, well, this may be out of line for me to say, but why don't you spend more time with Chika? She's like your little sister, after all!

Vert...I'm actually a little surprised you came out of your room to talk to me. Aren't you too busy playing videogames most of the time? I think that, maybe, this time that's what you should have done.
No, I am no longer interested in being your little sister.

Goodness, what?! M-me, fighting Vert! No way, there's no way I could win, though![NEWLINE]...I guess I have no choice, do I? Very well, if beating you is what it takes to ensure Planeptune's safety, then I'll do it!
Vert, I think I'm about to tell you something that'll make you quite happy. I've been thinking about it, and...well, I'd like to take you up on your offer of being your honorary little sister!
Ah, hi there, Blanc! It looks like there's a Lowee in this dimension, too! I'm assuming Rom and Ram are doing okay? Good! Let's make sure that Planeptune and Lowee get along great!

I...I knew I couldn't win against you when you were mad. I guess I've failed Planeptune, then...I'm sorry, everyone! A-are you going to execute me?[NEWLINE]You're not? All I have to do is be Rom and Ram's permanent playmate? Well...okay, that's not a bad fate at all, all things considered...
Hey again, Blanc! Read any good books lately? Ehehe, I know you have, it was just me trying to be funny...[NEWLINE]...wait, you read HOW MANY since I last saw you?!
I'm glad you usually come to see me here in Planeptune! It's so cold in Lowee, it makes my legs go all numb every time.
Um, Blanc, you've got something on your face. Oh, it's permanent marker? I'm assuming Ram did it to you...ehehe. It suits you![NEWLINE]Wah, don't get mad! I'm sorry!
And to think, I once respected you, Blanc. What happened to you? Did you let that bad temper of yours take over completely?
I don't care how many insults you throw my way. Whatever it is you want, you won't get it out of me.

Lowee and Planeptune are now at war?! ...fine. I know you won't bring Ram and Rom into this, so...it may hurt me a bit, but if it's just you and your armies I have to fight, I won't hold back. I know you can take it!

Listen. You and I have a really uncommon similarity...that in the past, we've taken the powers of goddesses to protect what we believe in. But that's where the similarities end. "You did nothing wrong?" You've done everything wrong! And that's exactly why I'm going to beat you![NEWLINE]...yes, I'm well aware that my actions were more...permanent, than yours. That's a fact I live with every day, you won't break me with it.

Ah, hello! Welcome to Planeptune, I hope you're liking it so far! My name is Nepgear, and I'm the CPU Candidate here! Oh, uh, I mean, I'm THE CPU here now...sorry, just too used to introducing myself as a Candidate. Anyway, pleased to meet you![NEWLINE]...wow! For some reason, you really remind me of Uni! I think it's your tone of voice or something!
Ohh, it's so good to see a friendly face like yours again! This CPU job is so stressful...but I'm going to keep doing my best!
Ahh, seeing you again makes me so happy! You wanna take a little break from our leadership duties and play some games with me?[NEWLINE]Oh goodness, I'm starting to sound like Neptune, huh? Ahahaha...
No, seriously, you sound just like Uni! It's uncanny! In fact, it's so uncanny that I think I'm beginning to fall f--[NEWLINE]Bwaaah! Please ignore what I just said!

Ahhh, it's one of Planeptune's famous Mascots! Wait, what? You've decided to leave Planeptune and form your own country? What the goodness, why would you do that? ...well, okay. I will respect your decision to do so. I hope your new nation and Planeptune will still be on good terms!
Beaten by a Mascot rebellion...I guess I was never worthy of being the protagonist of Neptunia in the first place. Forever relegated to joke character status...
I'm glad to see your nation is prospering! Don't worry, I don't hold any grudge against you for seceding!
I should never have let you separate from Planeptune, after seeing the things you've done.

Ehhhh?! What the goody-two-goodness? Is this a Mascot Rebellion?! You planned on this from the beginning, didn't you? In that case, I won't hold back, and I will fight until you reunite with Planeptune! Prepare yourself!
